messages.message:
Hi Team, I’m trying to debug a mystery.  Looks like we are running a deployment called “ubuntu-tmp” in both dogfood and uat.  Does anyone know what this particular deployment is referring to?  It is the only remaining piece that is using the ibdata filestore, which we can otherwise remove easily.  [The ibdata filestore was previously used by msft containers which have since been moved over to using envoy and in-memory processing].

cc @Rakesh @Yash Aggarwal
It was added by me. Sorry I forgot to remove it after configuring permissions in the filestore.
okay, we should delete it then?
TY.   We can then delete the PV and the file-stores as well!
@Shubham Oli let me know once everything is deleted!  This is going to save us $1500 / month.  At this point every penny counts.
